org.scribe.oauth
Interface StateOAuth20Service

All Known Implementing Classes:
LinkedInOAuth20ServiceImpl, StateOAuth20ServiceImpl
public interface StateOAuth20Service

This interface defines that a service can handle a state parameter for the authorization url.

Since:
1.4.1
Author:
Jerome Leleu

Method Summary
 String getAuthorizationUrl(String state)
          Return an authorization url using a state parameter.
 

Method Detail

getAuthorizationUrl

String getAuthorizationUrl(String state)
Return an authorization url using a state parameter.

Parameters:

Returns:
an authorization url with a state parameter.
